mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_gnn_tree_price ( tree_cd, tree_unit, tree_qty, tree_unit_price, tree_price, tree_addr_cd, basis_dt, unit_std_cd, start_area_id, end_area_id, arbor_root_cm, arbor_bst_cm, arbor_hei_mm, shrub_wid_mm, shrub_hei_mm, sap_root_cm, cre_dt, cre_id ) VALUES ( #{treeCd}, #{treeUnit}, #{treeQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{treeUnitPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{treePrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{treeAddrCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TO_DATE(#{basisDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{unitStdCd}, #{startAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arborRootCm,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{arborBstCm,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{arborHeiMm,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{shrubWidMm,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{shrubHeiMm,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sapRootCm,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, NOW(), #{creId} )
